title: Braille Learning Platform
subtitle: FREELANCE PROJECT
description: A platform for learning braille made with Mobsoroon Association for the Blind in Breda,Saudi Arabia where there are courses and instructors to learn braille from , assessments , certificate generation , and a braille translation tool.
detailedDescription: A platform for learning braille made with Mobsoroon Association for the Blind in Breda,Saudi Arabia where there are courses and instructors to learn braille from , assessments , certificate generation , and a braille translation tool.
responsibilities: Translated Figma UI/UX designs into responsive, interfaces using Next.js, React.js, and TailwindCSS
Built and maintained backend services with Django REST Framework to power application logic and data flow
Engineered and integrated core application features, ensuring seamless user experiences and functionality
Configured Docker containers for streamlined development, testing, and deployment workflows
Deployed Amazon S3 integration for efficient media and file storage management
Optimized Hostinger VPS infrastructure for scalable and secure application hosting
Set up and fine-tuned Apache2 server configurations to enhance performance and security

title: Sabab Learning Management System
subtitle: QABED
description: A learning management system for college students with multiple features as self and batch-learning , exams , homeworks and mock exams generation from a question bank , and automatic exam correction for most question types.
detailedDescription: A learning management system for college students with multiple features as self and batch-learning , exams , homeworks and mock exams generation from a question bank , and automatic exam correction for most question types.
responsibilities: Implemented 20+ pages of the new Figma Design using React.Js and Next.Js
Refactored legacy code of the Models and APIs using Laravel 8
Developed admin dashboard using laravel-admin
Deployed the application on the hositnger cloud
Deployed the Frontend on the Hostinger VPS
Setup the reverse proxy using Apache2

subtitle: QABED
statusDescription: The user dashboard frontend is under development.
title: Fosol Learning Management System
description: A learning management system for school students with multiple features as exams , homeworks , question banks , virtual classes , exams correction , timetable generation for teachers , guardians dashboard and more.
detailedDescription: A learning management system for school students with multiple features as exams , homeworks , question banks , virtual classes , exams correction , timetable generation for teachers , guardians dashboard and more.
responsibilities: Developed the multiple different user roles dashboards using FilamentPHP
Implemnted an API service for all the features of the application
Wrote the 200+ tests for the API using Pest

title: Abwab Digital Library
subtitle: QABED
statusDescription: The user dashboard frontend is under development.
description: A multivendor digital library where stores can sell their books and articles to the public and users can buy them and read them online.
detailedDescription: A multivendor digital library where stores can sell their books and articles to the public and users can buy them and read them online.
responsibilities: Developed the multiple different user roles dashboards using FilamentPHP
Implemnted an API service for all the features of the application

title: Inventory Management System
subtitle: FREELANCE PROJECT
description: A full-stack inventory management system developed for the Egyptian Central Security Forces, used across 9 units to manage products and daily issuance for over 1000 officers and recruits.
detailedDescription: Developed a robust inventory system tailored for the Egyptian Central Security Forces, deployed across 9 operational units. The system supports the management of 30+ products and facilitates daily issuance and returns for more than 1000 officers and recruits. It includes user-friendly interfaces for product management, issue tracking, and comprehensive reporting features.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented a full-stack inventory system using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Django, and SQL
Managed database design and query optimization for efficient data handling
Created intuitive UI components for seamless product addition and transaction logging
Developed daily and monthly reporting tools to track product consumption and remaining stock
Ensured system scalability and usability across 9 different units

title: Library Management System
subtitle: PERSONAL PROJECT
description: A simple library management system built with Java Spring Boot to manage book borrowing records.
detailedDescription: Built a basic library management system using Java Spring Boot following MVC architecture. The app allows managing borrowing records, and includes unit tests for core functionality. Used Spring Data JPA for database interactions and followed clean coding practices.
features: Unit testing with JUnit and Mockito
Database integration with Spring Data JPA
responsibilities: Developed the backend using Spring Boot
Wrote unit tests for repositories , service layer methods , controllers
Set up data models and repositories using Spring Data JPA
Followed best practices for code structure and readability for the MVC architecture
Built the project using Maven
